Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to providing attorneys' fees to prevailing parties in human rights law cases
Summary: Provides for award of attorneys' fees to prevailing parties in human rights law cases.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to providing for the award of attorneys' fees to prevailing parties in actions based on the human rights law
